UnifiedActivityInsight.name: UnifiedActivityInsight
UnifiedActivityInsight.description: Represents an insight related to a unified activity.

ActivityId.description: ID of the unified activity that this insight is associated with.

AggregatedKeywordOccurrences.description: The number of keyword occurrences that triggered this insight. This field is the sum of occurrences for all the attached UnifiedActivityInsightKeyword objects.

OwnerId.description: Optional. ID of the owner of the insight. Only user-scoped insights have owners (Scope=USER).
